email_text:
curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:5000/scan \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "X-API-KEY: your_api_key_here" \
  -d '{"email_text": "Hello John, just a reminder about our meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Best regards, Sarah."}'

curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:5000/scan \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "X-API-KEY: your_api_key_here" \
  -d '{"email_text": "Thank you for your purchase. Your order will be shipped soon."}'

curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:5000/scan \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "X-API-KEY: your_api_key_here" \
  -d '{"email_text": "Congratulations! You’ve been selected to win a $1000 gift card. Click here to claim now!"}'

Dear Candidate,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been selected for Phase 2 of our recruitment process at Richdale AI  Agadir. 

Congratulations on this achievement ! 

Please find attached the following documents related to your assignment:

Smart Email Guardian: AI-Powered Spam & Phishing Detection Toolkit

Smart Email Guardian – Deployment & Verification Guide

Submission Deadline:
All deliverables must be submitted by Tuesday, July 22, 2025 end of the day. Please send your final work via email.

What You Must Submit:
A public GitHub repository containing the full project.

A functional CLI tool named email_guard.py, capable of accepting input and returning results.

A deployed web or mobile interface for user interaction.

A hosted backend API with a working /scan endpoint.

A demo video, only if the mobile app cannot be hosted online.

A detailed README.md with clear documentation.

A reflection.md summarizing your approach and what you’ve learned through this challenge.

This assignment is designed to evaluate not only your technical skills but also your ability to deliver a complete, user facing solution in a structured and autonomous manner.

 We look forward to seeing your creativity, problem-solving ability, and attention to detail reflected in your submission. 

You’ve already proven your potential, now it's time to take it one step further ! 

If you have any questions or need clarification at any point, please do not hesitate to reach out by email. 

Wishing you the very best of luck!

Best regards,
Soraya El Maaroufi

06 61 53 10 67 

Richdale AI  Agadir

result.label: ham
result.explanation: ✅ Appears to be a safe and legitimate message.

email_text:
Service Level Agreements are the heartbeat of IT operations—but when teams are buried in tickets and legacy tools, it’s no wonder they’re hard to hit.

What if you could flip the script?

In our July 23 webinar, we’ll show how SolarWinds solutions help you:

Use automation and AI to meet SLA deadlines faster
Improve visibility and accuracy with integrated asset and knowledge management
Prioritize UX to reduce friction for agents and end users
Crushing your SLAs isn’t about working harder—it’s about working smarter with a tool that has the right features.

📅Date: July 23, 2025
⏰Time: 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. CT

Secure your seat below before it’s too late.

 
Register Now
